publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-14.1 Bill Aitken: M74 Northern Extensionâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-14) in the name of Rosie Kane, leave out from "opposition" to end and insert "support for the M74 Northern Extension but invites the Scottish Executive to examine the potential impact of a significant increase in traffic exiting from the extension on the Tradeston and Plantation areas of the City of Glasgow and to undertake a study on how the proposed extension plans might be amended in order to obviate any problems of congestion and promotes the free flow of traffic south of the River Clyde."
S2M-14.1 M74 Northern Extension (lodged on 22 May 2003) Pauline McNeill*
